propSpec.name: value
propSpec.desc: A stack of dashboards that have been opened (last in first out)

propSpec.name: captionMap
propSpec.desc: Contains mappings that are used to translate dashboards to captions that are displayed in the label

propSpec.name: resetList
propSpec.desc: Contains a list of dashboards that, when opened, should cause the value stack to be cleared

propSpec.name: currentDashboard
propSpec.desc: The location of the current dashboard. This is used for flows

propSpec.name: prpsLabel
propSpec.desc: Properties that will be set for the crumbtrail's label

propSpec.name: prpsIcon
propSpec.desc: Properties that will be set for the crumbtrail's icon
